title: _livecasino.io_
author: _livecasino.io_
content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community!Because we really value the opinions from this community, this time we decided to run a Promo for a game from a different provider. kudos @Coin_trader  So Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo#26 is for 1 mBTC free bet for Bombay Club Live Roulette!!! and it will work like this:Reward1mBTC free bet on Bombay Club Live Roulette game!How?Opt-in by sending PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #26 has PM subject to facilitate the management)Make at least 1 depositWager at least 10 mBTC on any games at Livecasino.ioPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post to Sunday 7th August, 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participate Multi accounts will not be eligible for the reward The reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 8th August, 17:00 GMT Free bet has 1x wagering requirement All bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freebet Normal livecasino.io terms and conditions still apply Due to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent rewardWe hope you enjoy!Flávio from livecasino.io team

comments.author: Renato297
comments.body: it would be better if you shuffle the wagering requirement
